title: The Christian Cowboy
description: A gunslinging stranger arrives in Las Vegas to clean up the rottenest town in the west. He meets a beautiful nun and his life is changed forever.
altHero: young priest with cross earring and cowboy hat, riding a motorcycle with a light-up cross on the front
alt1: the Christian cowboy preaching on the Vegas strip
alt3: a large man in a Scottish kilt and holding bagpipes, points a gun
